gmailSignInDescription: Sign in with your Google account to connect it to Velo.
completeSignIn: Complete the sign-in in your browser, then return here.
chooseConnectionMethod: Choose how you want to connect your email account.
gmailOauthDescription: Connect via OAuth with full Gmail API support
imapDescription: Connect any email provider with manual server configuration
caldavDescription: Connect iCloud, Fastmail, Nextcloud, or any CalDAV calendar server
registerAppWith: You need to register an app with {{provider}} to get a Client ID.
registerAzure: Register at the Azure Portal (App Registrations) with redirect URI
registerYahoo: Register at the Yahoo Developer Network with redirect URI
usernameHelp: Leave blank to use your email address
usernameDiffersHelp: Only needed if your login username differs from your email address.
enterPassword: Enter your email password or app password
appPasswordHelp: If your provider requires it, use an app-specific password.
autoConfigured: Server settings have been auto-configured for your provider. You can adjust them if needed.
selfSignedHelp: Enable for local mail bridges like ProtonMail Bridge
testDescription: Test your connection settings before adding the account.
